story:
What Is The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights Movement?

The Insurance Industry needs a Rule Book to protect consumers and to provide guidelines for insurance agents.  The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights movement will revolutionize the insurance purchasing and insurance management process and place insurance consumers, insurance agents and insurance companies on the same page.  Insurance is a large part of everyone's financial plan. If insurance gives you a headache and you're looking for simple answers to complex questions then help me spread the word about the Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights.  

The Impact

Having an Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights:

  • Will put consumers in charge of their insurance portfolio (insurance policies)
  • Provide insurance agents and insurance companies with a playbook to follow
  • Help consumers to not be taken advantage of with insurance that doesn't provide any benefit.
  • Assist financial planners, attorneys, accountants and other advisors in providing guidance to their clients.

Who Am I?

I'm The Creator of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights and Founder of The Insurance Literacy Institute.  As a consumer advocate my goal is to educate Insurance Consumers and to provide Best Practice Guidelines (a Rule Book) for insurance agents and the rest of the insurance industry. I'm also an author of the award winning Questions and Answers on Insurance book series.  

Over 30 years in the insurance industry, I've seen that a lot of consumers end up with insurance that they don't need, don't have insurance that need, are confused about their insurance and pay more in premiums than they need to.  The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights is designed as a playbook to help consumers understand what rights they have with their insurance and provide expectations.  The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights provides guidance to insurance agents and other members of the insurance industry to make sure that they are helping consumers make fully informed choices to get the right insurance at the lowest premiums.    

How You Can Help:

Be a part  of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights Movement!  

  • Funding The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights will go towards the publication of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights: How To Win At The Game of Insurance and promoting the Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights. 
  • Perks include being listed on The Insurance Literacy Institute website as a Supporter of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights, Copy of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights: How To Win At The Game of Insurance, copies of the entire Questions and Answers on Insurance Series.
  • All funds raised will go to publishing The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights: How To Win At The Game of Insurance whether or not the project is fully funded.  Excess funds will go to promoting The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights and outreach programs along with expanding free content on The Insurance Literacy Institute website.
The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights: How To Win At The Game of Insurance will be a full book between 350-400 pages.

Risks & Challenges

The insurance industry is an old industry that can be set in its ways.  Most insurance companies, insurance agents and others in the industry want to the right thing however there are some who will not agree with this as they do not want their actions highlighted.  Knowledge is power and some would prefer that consumers not have knowledge.

  • With 30 years in the Insurance Industry as an agent, fee-based insurance consultant, litigation consultant, author, consumer advocate and insurance literacy pioneer; I've seen the problems and challenges and can help provide a solution that is a win-win for everyone consumers, insurance agents, insurance companies and others in the insurance industry.
  • I will work through the media and others in the insurance industry and financial services industry who are looking for positive change.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you contribute to the campaign for The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights, you can still help advocate for Insurance Consumers:

  • Sign the petition at Change.org to support The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights
  • Share this campaign through the IndieGoGo Share Tools

Knowledge is power and the power should be in the hands of the customer, the Insurance Consumer. 

Thanks for being an advocate for Insurance Consumer Rights and helping Consumers take charge of their Insurance.  

And please come by and visit The Insurance Literacy Institute website at www.insuranceliteracy.org
story_txt:
What Is The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights Movement? The Insurance Industry needs a Rule Book to protect consumers and to provide guidelines for insurance agents.  The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights movement will revolutionize the insurance purchasing and insurance management process and place insurance consumers, insurance agents and insurance companies on the same page.  Insurance is a large part of everyone's financial plan. If insurance gives you a headache and you're looking for simple answers to complex questions then help me spread the word about the Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights.  

The Impact
Having an Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights:

Will put consumers in charge of their insurance portfolio (insurance policies)
Provide insurance agents and insurance companies with a playbook to follow
Help consumers to not be taken advantage of with insurance that doesn't provide any benefit.
Assist financial planners, attorneys, accountants and other advisors in providing guidance to their clients.

Who Am I?
I'm The Creator of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights and Founder of The Insurance Literacy Institute.  As a consumer advocate my goal is to educate Insurance Consumers and to provide Best Practice Guidelines (a Rule Book) for insurance agents and the rest of the insurance industry. I'm also an author of the award winning Questions and Answers on Insurance book series.  
Over 30 years in the insurance industry, I've seen that a lot of consumers end up with insurance that they don't need, don't have insurance that need, are confused about their insurance and pay more in premiums than they need to.  The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights is designed as a playbook to help consumers understand what rights they have with their insurance and provide expectations.  The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights provides guidance to insurance agents and other members of the insurance industry to make sure that they are helping consumers make fully informed choices to get the right insurance at the lowest premiums.    
  How You Can Help:
 Be a part  of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights Movement!    Funding The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights will go towards the publication of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights: How To Win At The Game of Insurance and promoting the Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights.  Perks include being listed on The Insurance Literacy Institute website as a Supporter of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights, Copy of The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights: How To Win At The Game of Insurance, copies of the entire Questions and Answers on Insurance Series. All funds raised will go to publishing The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights: How To Win At The Game of Insurance whether or not the project is fully funded.  Excess funds will go to promoting The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights and outreach programs along with expanding free content on The Insurance Literacy Institute website. 
The Insurance Consumer Bill of Rights: How To Win At The Game of Insurance will be a full book between 350-400 pages.

With 30 years in the Insurance Industry as an agent, fee-based insurance consultant, litigation consultant, author, consumer advocate and insurance literacy pioneer; I've seen the problems and challenges and can help provide a solution that is a win-win for everyone consumers, insurance agents, insurance companies and others in the insurance industry. I will work through the media and others in the insurance industry and financial services industry who are looking for positive change. story:
“We heard a helicopter and it kind of sounded like, I don’t know, something off. It sounded like extremely loud and rumbling, like engine problems,” said Melissa Bush. “All of a sudden, we didn’t hear the helicopter. We looked out and there was literally fire, and right in front of us, fire and flames coming down… As they were coming down, all of a sudden you see a big fire explosion and then all of a sudden we didn’t see anything. It went black.”
  A massive search-and-rescue effort is underway after two U.S. Marine Corps helicopters crashed off Haleiwa late Thursday night.
  A total of 12 crew members — six were on board each helicopter — remain missing at this time.
 Search and rescue personnel with military, federal, state and city agencies joined forces in the search-and-rescue operation.
  The Coast Guard says a safety zone has been established between Kaena Point and Turtle Bay, though “with 10-12 knot winds, swells at 16 feet, and breaking surf at 30 feet, it’s moving the debris all over the place,”
  As of Friday afternoon, no dive teams were sent into the water. “It’s just barely safe for our rescue crews to be out there, so it’s not safe for divers just yet,”
  After five full days of searching, multi-agency rescue crews found no signs of survivors. The search was called off on Tuesday, Jan. 19.
  On Friday, 12 flak jackets, helmets, rifles, boots, and lei draped over a cross represented each Marine who was taken too soon. Communities from coast-to-coast are mourning these Marines, and our nation is forever grateful for their patriotism, service, and sacrifice. Our thoughts and prayers are with their families and loved ones at this difficult hour. This is one of many heartbreaking disasters where Scuba Search and Rescue is needed.

    People need us! Anywhere there are bodies of water where people work or play, search and rescue divers inevitably find themselves called to action. I want to make search and rescue diving my life’s work. This demanding and rewarding calling requires training and skill, plus a high level of physical fitness, and more.

  Search and Rescue Divers mission:  Lost divers and swimmers, hurricane and storm victims, shipwreck survivors, along with many others who find themselves in need of rescue.Accidents take place in a variety of environments; in mountain lakes and rivers, in quarries and ponds, and at popular open water dive sites, on reefs and at wrecks.  Equipment malfunctions, ice breaks beneath people walking across it, currents become unmanageable, tunnels inside caves collapse; what can go wrong does.  As any professional search and rescue diver can tell you, the circumstances in which people find themselves are often unpredictable and frightening; often, by the time dive teams arrive at the scene of an emergency, victims are unresponsive or have already perished.  It is a tragic horrible event when someone loses a loved one. It is never an easy process dealing with the loss of a friend, family member, or loved one especially if it comes unexpectedly. The number one rule rescuers must remember is to always expect the unexpected.  

  Any unexpected death is difficult at its best, but I have to say that a drowning victim that has not yet been recovered has to be one of the worst. In a typical situation where a person passes away, the family immediately starts funeral preparations. After the funeral, the closure/healing process can begin.  In a drowning however, typically funeral arrangements do not happen before the body is found.Which means the healing process is delayed: day – after day - after day.  For some people, every new day is another day of reliving the day of tragedy.  Can you imagine the pain? I have seen people that have relived this day for several days, weeks, and months. I’m sure there are people that have relived it for years. It is heartbreaking! Anyone’s heart would break just listening to the stories of people that have suffered waiting for someone to bring their loved one home so they can one day begin their closure. For some people they know that their loved one is gone, but yet in the back of their mind (because the body has not been found) they hope that their loved one will still come walking through the door at any time.

  Hi folks, my name is Ryan,  I moved to Florida to pursue a career as a Water Search and Rescue/Master Diver. I am currently a certified Scuba Diver with Nitrox training out of Bradenton Scuba Quest in Bradenton Florida. I was studying and training to be a Water Rescue Diver for a host of reasons. One is to save lives. God gives everyone talents. He gives us those talents in order that we may serve others. He expects us to use the talents he has given us. He has given Scuba Divers certain talents that enable us to do this type of work. To help make a difference in water rescue, disaster and prevention. What we get in return for making a recovery. The greatest gift of all: being able to help someone else in need.

  In order to maintain rescue team safety and increase the odds of saving lives, rescuers must be well equipped and well trained; which means ongoing training is necessary on a regular basis and you have to invest in your own training and own equipment.  Equipment requirements vary depending upon the environment and conditions that are typically present as well as conditions that could arise.  Full face masks and communications equipment, plus a diver propulsion vehicle are some of the items you might need to utilize during the course of training and operations. Along with a Standard Equipment List that is required, consisting of:

Mask – Scuba Quality with Neoprene Mask Strap Recommended
Snorkel – Folding snorkel is acceptable for Scuba Courses
Fins – Open Heel with Neoprene Boots for Scuba Courses

Exposure Protection – Appropriate for the Conditions
Dive Log Book – In hard binder with Pen, DAN Card, and Emergency Information
Certification Card – unless you are an Open Water Student

Recommended Personal Gear
Backup Light – during the daylight can be used in limited visibility or to look in dark spaces
Mask Defogger
Camera – Video and Photo Camera with Appropriate Lighting, Extra Batteries, and Memory Card
Beach Towel and Dry Clothing to Change into
Spare Mask – Especially if a prescription mask

Required Scuba Gear:
Dive Computer – Recommend Air Integration
Buoyancy Compensator Device (BCD) (Recommend Integrated Weight Pockets)
Regulator with Alternate Air Source, Depth Gauge, and Pressure Gauge (SPG) (Depth and Pressure Gauge may be substituted with features from Dive Computer)
Scuba Tank(s) – Enough air for the day of diving
Weights – Appropriate for conditions and environment
Underwater Compass (may be substituted with features from Dive Computer)
Weight Belt (may be substituted if using BCD with Integrated Weight Pockets)
Lead Weights – Appropriate to perform Buoyancy Weight Check appropriately

Recommended Scuba Gear
Slate w/ Pencil or Underwater Notebook – Write Underwater for Easier Communication
Spare Parts Kit
Octopus Keeper or Necklace
SPG or Console Clip/Keeper
Dive Bags: A Bag for your dive gear and a padded regulator bag for your regulator, console, and computer
Mask and Slate Cleaner
Goody or “Catch Bag”

Required Safety Devices:
Audible Emergency Notification Device – Dive Alert is highly recommended; Whistle works well too
Visual Emergency Notification Device – Orange Surface Marker Buoy (SMB) and/or Safety Mirror
Cutting Device – Shears, Dive Tool (Knife), and/or Utility Knife (EEZYCUT)
Sun Screen – Waterproof and designed for use on face
Mobile Phone or Marine Radio – Access to Emergency Services

Recommended Safety Devices
Secondary or Backup Cutting Device - Shears, Dive Tool (Knife), and/or Utility Knife
Redundant Air Supply – Spare Air or Pony Bottle with Regulator
Small First Aid Kit – Especially if diving in local lakes from shore
Small Oxygen Unit – Especially if diving in local lakes from shore
Pocket Mask – to perform Rescue Breaths in the event of CPR

Required and Recommended Exposure Protection: – Varies on Conditions
7mm, 5mm, or 3mm Wetsuit
Neoprene Vest – as an undergarment to the Wetsuit
Hood (or Hooded Neoprene Vest)
Gloves
Rash Guard

Optional Exposure Protection
Drysuit with Undergarment
Argon Inflation System with Drysuit
HotSuits Wetsuit Heaters
Boat Coat for Pre and Post Dive Activities

Site Required Gear and Accessories
Water – 2 bottles
Dive Flag – It is the law

Courses consist of: PADI or NAUI Scuba Diver, Open water diver, Adventure Diver, Advanced Open Water Diver, Rescue Diver, Master Scuba Diver™ , Emergency First Response Provider, Discover Local Diving, Divemaster, Assistant Instructor, Open Water Scuba Instructor, Specialty Instructor, Master Scuba Diver Trainer, Master Instructor Rating, Emergency First Response Instructor

Along with these mandatory courses there is a large list PADI or NAUI specialty courses: Altitude Diver, AWARE - Fish Identification, AWARE - Coral Reef Conservation Diver, Boat Diver, Cavern Diver, Deep Diver, Digital Underwater Photographer, Diver Propulsion Vehicle Diver, Discover Rebreather, Drift Diver, Dry Suit Diver, Enriched Air Diver, Emergency Oxygen Provider, Equipment Specialist, Ice Diver, Multilevel Diver, Night Diver, Peak Performance Buoyancy, Rebreather Diver, Project AWARE®, Specialist, Public Safety Diver™ , Search and Recovery Diver, Sidemount Diver, Underwater Naturalist, Underwater Navigator, Underwater Videographer, Wreck Diver, Distinctive Specialties, Advanced Rebreather Diver and Emergency First Response Instructor.

The funding I am asking for is not nearly enough to do all of this but, it will get me to where I want to be, saving lives with the proper training and equipment. I am asking you please to help me to help others in need of rescue: to obtain the required equipment and mandatory training to help make a difference in water rescue, disaster and prevention. What we get in return for making a recovery. The greatest gift of all: being able to help someone else in need. With your help we will save lives! If you cannot make a donation I ask you please, folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign using the INDIEGOGO share tool. 


 

A Dive Rescuers Prayer

When I'm called for duty God
to dive beneath the waves.
To search for an unfortunate soul
whose body they have claimed.

Let swiftness be my virtue
to find that soul in time.
Please let this be a rescue lord
and not the other "kind"

Be my eyes in the darkest waters
and guide me with your hand
that this person may be saved
when we return to land.

If this is not your will Lord
then please show me the way
to sort out this sad mystery
and to dive another day.

If things become the darkest Lord
and it's I that you call home
please guide my friends and family
that they'll never walk alone.
 
  by Kris D. Andrews

story:
According to a New York Times article by Eileen Pollack, "the problem is that most girls...decide they don't like math and science before those subjects reveal their true beauty, a condition worsened by the unimaginative ways in which science and math are taught."   Also, fewer women choose STEM majors in college and subsequently go on to careers related to mathematics. The Deal Her In  project is designed to address this issue by teaching fifth-grade girls mathematics and strategic thinking skills through learning card games.  The participants will learn two to three games, which increase in difficulty as they advance.  They will also get to take home packs of cards, score pads and an instruction manual so they can teach their friends, family and community to play card games.

This project has been chosen by The Millennial Trains Project (MTP) for funding!  MTP is an award-winning 501(c)3 non-profit organization that leads transcontinental train journeys for young innovators to explore America’s new frontiers. Deal Her In is an officially approved campaign for one of MTP's 2016 journeys.

With your support, I will be on the following cross-country journey to implement my project this August:

What We Need & What You Get

The donations help to underwrite the costs of the journey.  The contributions given to successful applicant campaigns go to help cover expenses associated with the trip (on-train accommodation, flights, meals, and all MTP-related programming activities). 

Donations will not only support my journey and project, but by donating you can claim exclusive Deal Her In items!  See the perks listed for more details about these special offers.

The Impact

My MTP project is designed to cultivate the mathematics and strategic thinking skills of girls in the cities I visit.  I believe that these are important abilities for girls, in particular, to develop at a young age to carry into their future endeavors.  The US school system does not currently prepare students well enough to succeed in mathematics compared to other developed countries.  The Deal Her In program will address this issue by showing girls that strategic card games are fun and educational. 

Card playing doesn’t require many tools (all you need is a deck of cards, a pen and a score pad) and it is something that brings together people of different ages and backgrounds.  My cousins, my brother and I learned card games from my 92-year-old grandfather and we play cards with him to this day.  No matter your age and your physical capabilities you can play cards, so help me pass on this time-honored activity to the next generation of girls across the country and beyond!

About Me

Thank you for your interest in Deal Her In! My name is Lauren Mandell; I am based in the Boston area and I work at a real estate law firm.  

I am also an active card player and for the past three years I have played cards with the same group of friends.  Unfortunately, I am the only woman who plays!  

The mathematics and strategic thinking skills that I continue to develop through playing cards are very transferable to other areas. Therefore, I want to get women more involved in playing cards (and learning these important skills) by encouraging girls to play card games throughout their lives.

I appreciate any way you can help me with Deal Her In.  See below for non-monetary ways to contribute as I know not all of us have extra money lying around!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially, don’t worry.  Here are other ways to support Deal Her In:

1. Spread the word! This crowdfunding page can be found at https://igg.me/at/deal-her-in-2

2. Know anyone in LA, San Fran, Denver, Milwaukee, or Detroit?  Connect me with people in the cities my train stops who would be interested in my project-especially if they work in schools or after school programs!

3. Follow my journey on Twitter and Instagram @deal_her_in

4. Like the Deal Her In Facebook page at www.facebook.com/dealherin

5. Donate items that I can use for a raffle at my fundraising event

Thank you for your support!  Now shuffle up and Deal Her In!

Note: the excellent Deal Her In logo was created by Graphic Designer Kathryn Wood!
story_txt: According to a New York Times article by Eileen Pollack, "the problem is that most girls...decide they don't like math and science before those subjects reveal their true beauty, a condition worsened by the unimaginative ways in which science and math are taught."   Also, fewer women choose STEM majors in college and subsequently go on to careers related to mathematics. The Deal Her In  project is designed to address this issue by teaching fifth-grade girls mathematics and strategic thinking skills through learning card games.  The participants will learn two to three games, which increase in difficulty as they advance.  They will also get to take home packs of cards, score pads and an instruction manual so they can teach their friends, family and community to play card games.This project has been chosen by The Millennial Trains Project (MTP) for funding!  MTP is an award-winning 501(c)3 non-profit organization that leads transcontinental train journeys for young innovators to explore America’s new frontiers. Deal Her In is an officially approved campaign for one of MTP's 2016 journeys.With your support, I will be on the following cross-country journey to implement my project this August:What We Need & What You GetThe donations help to underwrite the costs of the journey.  The contributions given to successful applicant campaigns go to help cover expenses associated with the trip (on-train accommodation, flights, meals, and all MTP-related programming activities). Donations will not only support my journey and project, but by donating you can claim exclusive Deal Her In items!  See the perks listed for more details about these special offers.The ImpactMy MTP project is designed to cultivate the mathematics and strategic thinking skills of girls in the cities I visit.  I believe that these are important abilities for girls, in particular, to develop at a young age to carry into their future endeavors.  The US school system does not currently prepare students well enough to succeed in mathematics compared to other developed countries.  The Deal Her In program will address this issue by showing girls that strategic card games are fun and educational. Card playing doesn’t require many tools (all you need is a deck of cards, a pen and a score pad) and it is something that brings together people of different ages and backgrounds.  My cousins, my brother and I learned card games from my 92-year-old grandfather and we play cards with him to this day.  No matter your age and your physical capabilities you can play cards, so help me pass on this time-honored activity to the next generation of girls across the country and beyond!About MeThank you for your interest in Deal Her In! My name is Lauren Mandell; I am based in the Boston area and I work at a real estate law firm.  I am also an active card player and for the past three years I have played cards with the same group of friends.  Unfortunately, I am the only woman who plays!  The mathematics and strategic thinking skills that I continue to develop through playing cards are very transferable to other areas. Therefore, I want to get women more involved in playing cards (and learning these important skills) by encouraging girls to play card games throughout their lives.I appreciate any way you can help me with Deal Her In.  See below for non-monetary ways to contribute as I know not all of us have extra money lying around!Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cannot contribute financially, don’t worry.  Here are other ways to support Deal Her In:1. Spread the word! This crowdfunding page can be found at https://igg.me/at/deal-her-in-22. Know anyone in LA, San Fran, Denver, Milwaukee, or Detroit?  Connect me with people in the cities my train stops who would be interested in my project-especially if they work in schools or after school programs!3. Follow my journey on Twitter and Instagram @deal_her_in4. Like the Deal Her In Facebook page at www.facebook.com/dealherin5. Donate items that I can use for a raffle at my fundraising eventThank you for your support!  Now shuffle up and Deal Her In!Note: the excellent Deal Her In logo was created by Graphic Designer Kathryn Wood!

story:
YeeeeeeeeHA! is what you shout out when you are feeling lucky at the casino and this is what our app is all about.

I am Khit Wong and I have been researching for this "Lucky Streak" or "Favorable Time" for 15 years now.

You may regard this "Favorable Time" as

"The time period for something good, but out of your normal expectations, to occur."

and it can occur in various forms:

It can be manifested as a tangible prize in a lucky draw, the no.3 top prize for the night, for example.

   

It can be manifested as an unexpected cash prize. for example, paying out $1,000 from a $10 scratch card.

It can, as well,  be manifested as winning an mini-Jackpot. The image below shows the slot machine paying 50 times its normal payout during the Favorable Time.

The Favorable Time is not limited to money related matters, it can also be manifested as a job promotion.

and of course, it could be manifested as profit from your successful trading activities, and from betting at the right time.

and it works for horse-race betting as well. Despite the return is not very high, the accuracy level is very high.  Having 5 out of 5 winning during the Favourable Time.

Here are just a few of the Khit Wong's many references

(more can be found at his website)

This is a Euro Forecast Khit made in January, 2015. The youtube post date was 11 Jan 2015. Arguably he could make 50 videos and only show the correct one after-the-fact, but there were over 365 x 365 possibilities of catching both of the Euro's year low at the beginning of 2015.

source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=24mnQru87gY

Actual year lows were just two and seven days away from his forecasted Euro lows, 11 months ago.

And here are some of Khit's many happy customers' testimonials

 

 

 

 

    

The Favorable Time does not guarantee your success but it enhances your chances of producing a positive outcome.

I found in my research that these financially lucrative events tend to manifest themselves in the favorable times, so if we continue to do our intraday trades, casino visits, sports betting, and job interviews during these favorable times, we will have a much more higher chance of achieving a positive result out if it.

However, not all of these favorable times would produce positive results, but my three-year-research concluded that over 70% of all positive events do occur during these favorable time periods.

There are more complicated formulas in this App, and we need your help!

Although this is actually the second App I have developed, The first one - Ephemeris Alarm , a Top 200 App (http://www.mobbo.com/iOS/App/net.biggo.eph-alar...) and has already helped hundreds of traders around the globe to reap profit from the stock market.

This YeeHa! App is much more complicated and I need to find a new programmer to program the individual favorable time periods which can go down to specific hours in a day.

If you are interested, please feel free to click on the Early Adopters Perk and help kick start this project, thank you!

For details, please visit our website at http://www.trineaspect.com

Feel free to drop me any questions regarding this campaign at the "Ask a Question" link above or you may also contact us at support@trineaspect.com
or by whatsapp at (+852) 6779-4421. 

With this app, you will never waste your bets again and you can focus on betting only during the Favorable Time Periods when you have the highest chance of winning there.

story:
WHY CHATEEE ? 

It  enhances  childrens  IQ,  because  they  guessing  words,  they try to  remember different terms  and  names on  sweatshirt,  which  they  have  created.  They create words out of alphabet,  which  they  have  learned,  or  they  can  create  their  own words. They think about various games in patches, creating  poems in text patches, they can  create  different  character  every  day   and  think   about   how  actually create it.

They can make new  friendships,  because kids are still so open  minded,  they can write to each other and  exchange  characters in between  them,  but still being part of it.

It enriches  creativity,  by coloring  sticky bubbles,  they change shapes,  they play games in other icons, even creating stories.

This concept could be also applied in schools and daycares.

 

 

It could help to improve communication and relationships between parents and kids. They can draw, play guessing games and leaving each other messages, which makes them think!!!

You will be pleased to know that you dont have to be ONLINE! What that does  mean? Kids are going to feel more relaxed in these sweatshirts, they dont need to be spending time on phone. They play and learn like we used to!

This concept contains aproximately 100 patches. It is flexible, usable for wide scale of audience, different age levels, also knowledge.

It contains different types of the pictures.  Sports, fairytale characters, universe, transport, food – everything what children love!

Because it has been created to be UNISEX, COOL and ORIGINAL.

Because it is modern, multipurpose, partly handmade, memorable and affordable!

 

Did  you  know  that the  patches in fashion are nowadays  very  trendy?  Check  out  some celebs pictures !

 

 

FOUNDER STORY:

My name is Ales Raus, I’m 33 years old and I’m from Slovakia. While my studies at University, I decided to go to London for my summer break and improve my English skills. My trip was almost over, when I decided to help my friend to clean windows. When we were almost done, I accidently felt from the ladder. This fall was such disconsolate that it left me paralyzed on half of my body and it damaged my spinal cord as well. In one second my whole life changed; horrible pain and struggle to stand up, all this in foreign country. I was hyperactive since I was a child and I could not imagine myself without walking or running; just sitting for the rest of my life. Dear God, that was such a horrible imagination. It took me a while until I was able to stand again on my feet from the wheelchair and get back to normal life. Strong belief in God along with my faith to get soon better got connected with my faith to accomplish something big in my life and urge to become successful among healthy individuals. It has been couple years after my accident and I had the opportunity to visit me the most admired New York City. The city you can see almost in every movie. This amazing city gave me the idea about interactive clothing. The idea came to me while waiting in metro station for train. I was observing people; everyone was super busy with their phones either texting or calling. Some young boys were sticking stickers on trash cans... I was thinking to myself; what a busy life. Nobody is paying attention to others, they don't even look at each other’s. And suddenly - idea: " Why don't we start to communicate on ourselves? This could be the way we can express ourselves, leave the message, draw attention and be original at the same time. For the most of the time, I was working on this project on my own. With support of this campaign, you will help me to accomplish my dreams.

AFTER  OUR  CAMPAIGN  END,  WE  WILL  SEND  YOU  SURVEY  WHICH   SIZE, COLOR,  PATCHES  AND  NUMBER  OF  PATCHES  YOU  WANT EXACTLY INTO YOUR PERK !

 

 

OUR 3D PLASTIC PVC PATCHES

After our research we picked most favourite characters.  Some of these characters have been created by kids! 

It is entirely up to you, how many characters and which type of patches you are gonna pick to your perks.

 

 

 

ABOUT CHATEEE SWEATSHIRTS

We have developed special glue and technical process for Velcro application.

Sweatshirts are covered with little balls, with Velcro only from front side. Sweatshirts can be washed in washing machines on 30 degrees.

You can stick and unstick velcro 1000´s.

Sweatshirts are made out of cotton and elastan.

Sweatshirts are very comfortable to wear.

Sweatshirts are made out of safe and certified materials.

Sweatshirts are partly handmade.

 

 

 
OUR GOALS

 

We want to use the funds raised to help us finance our first production. The minimum order of 3D PVC patches with better price are 1000 pieces, for sweatshirts are 200 pieces and for Velcro thousands of dots. Altogether the material and production costs for the first order amount to roughly 10.000 Euro.

 

 

THANKS 

I would like to say BIG thank you and ask you for a favour at the same time. Please share this campaign over facebook, instagram, pinterest and also please visit our e-shop!

AFTER OUR CAMPAIGN END, WE WILL SEND YOU SURVEY WHICH SIZE, COLOR, PATCHES  AND  NUMBER OF PATCHES YOU WANT EXACTLY INTO YOUR PERK !

 

RISK and CHALLANGES 

We are watching crowdfunding for a long time now and this is ours first campaign, so We make extra effort to get everything right.  Our biggest challenge is getting the word out quickly and eventually expanding the product line to accommodate all of our consumers’ needs. We are committed to delivering high-quality apparel, on time, and with the goal of exceeding expectations. As mentioned above, all of the necessary precautions have been taken to assure a smooth production transition. Some risks include material shortage, labor shortage, or shipment issues. But CHATEEE team has worked hard to make sure none of these potential threats become real.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

My size isn´t available ? 

Contact us via email please and we will deal with your request! 

Where we write what size, color, patches and number of patches need?

After our campaign end, We will send you survey which size, color, patches , and number of patches you want. 

Are sweatshirts washable ? 

We recommend on 30 degrees.

What if my clothes don´t fit right ?

If one of your clothes don't fit quite right, send them back !International customers will be subject to a $15 exchange fee.

Can I send you my own motives ?

Yes, of course you can, but we will be able to deal with your request after finishing the campaign.  Could you please send me your design and I will le´t you know if we can pursue.

How can I order more than one sweatshirt via Indiegogo ?

We are happy to accommodate special requests if you would like to order more of one item! Simply increase your pledge amount to correspond with the amount of items you would like to order and send us a quick message. We’re keeping track of backers who have a special request, and we’ll make sure you receive the items you want!

Have any further questions ?

Please,  email me directly at : info@chateee.com for any other inquiries.

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Prečo práve Chateee ? 

zvyšuje deťom IQ – pretože hádajú slová textu, snažia sa zapamätať rôzne názvy a mená na mikinách, ktoré si deti medzi sebou vytvorili . Z abecedy skladajú slová, ktoré sa naučili, alebo vymýšľajú vlastné . Rozmýšľajú nad hrami v ikonkách, vytvárajú rôzne básne v textových ikonkách , každý deň môžu stvárňovať inú obľúbenú postavičku a premyslieť ako ju vytvoria , ..

Nadväzuje  priateľstvá pretože doslova láka deti medzi sebou sa hrať , písať si, vymieňať si postavičky navzájom, kresliť si a hrať spoločné hry na sebe.

Spestruje detskú kreativitu - pretože v bublinkách vykresľujú rôzne postavičky , tvary,  na ďalších nášivkách sa hrajú hry, vytvárajú rôzne príbehy medzi postavičkami, zvieratkami a inými nášivkami

Pretože je koncept využiteľný ako učebná pomôcka pre deti v škôlkach a školách .

Pomáha prehĺbiť rodinné putá - pretože rodičia sa viac so svojimi deťmi hrajú, hádajú čo napíšu, nakreslia, hrajú s nimi hry , zanechávajú si rôzne odkazy a núti ich to premýšľať!

Určite budete nadšení , že nie sme on-line ale OFF-LINE ! Čo to znamená ? Že pri mikinách sa deti uvoľnia, nepotrebujú stále šťukať do mobilu . Hrajú sa tradičným spôsobom, učia a vymýšľajú presne tak ako my keď sme boli mladí !

Pretože koncept je ilustračne obohatený počtom asi 40 obrázkov. Je variabilný, použiteľný pre širokú škálu rôznej úrovne rozvoja mentálnych schopností, vedomostí detí.

Pretože obsahuje kompletnú líniu detských nášiviek oslavujúcich športy, rozprávkové bytosti, vesmír, dopravné prostriedky, jedlo – proste všetko čo deti milujú !

Pretože je vytvorený ako UNISEX, COOOL a je originálny .

Pretože mikiny sú moderné, viacúčelové, imidžové, ručne robené, zapamätateľné a cenovo dostupné.

 

O nás:

Koncept sme najskôr vymysleli pre seba, aby sme skúsili komunikovať aj iným spôsobom, zabávali, odkazovali na sebe myšlienky okoliu.. Avšak časom sme pochopili, že je ti ideálny produkt pre deti ich rodičov a školy .Strávili sme pri tom vyšše 1,5 roka, dali si vyvinúť vlastnú zmes a technologický postup na priliepanie suchého zipsu o mikiny, tak by sa dali prať a na stovky ráz namáhať priliepaním a odliepaním. Oslovili sme čo najväčšiu skupinu detí, rodičov, riaditeľov škôlok, škôl a rôznych študentských organizácií o tom aké farby mikín sa im najviac páčia, aké by chceli mať postavičky na ikonkách a aké druhy ikoniek by radi nosili. Dnes môžeme CHATEEE mikiny kľudne nazvať riešením „Všetko V Jednom“ je to produkt zábavný pretože deti si kreslia rôzne hry , píšu rôzne veci do bubliniek , vymieňajú obľúbené nášivky, hádajú kto má čo vo vrecúšku, vytvárajú priateľstvá, píšu si rôzne básničky do nezmývateľných textových bubliniek atď.   

Grafiky na 3D plastické PVC nášivky

Obrázky nižšie slúžia nato, aby ste si presne vedeli vybrať aké nášivky chcete do svojich balíčkov !

Je na vašom výbere, ktoré a koľko postavičiek si vyberiete do svojich balíčkov.

Na základe výskumu medzi deťmi sme vybrali najobľúbenejšie postavičky.

Niektoré z postavičiek nakreslili sami decká ! 

 

O CHATEEE mikinách:

Máme vypracovaný vlastné lepidlo a technologický postup aplikácie suchého zipsu na mikiny.

Mikinky sú pokryté krúžkami zo suchého zipsu iba z prednej strany. Mikiny môžete  prať pri 30 stupňoch.

Môžete na mikiny priliepať a odliepať len nášivky a to tisíce ráz.

Mikiny sú vyrobené s bavlny a elastanu .

Mikiny sú príjemne počesané.

Mikiny sú zdravotne nezávadné

 

Časový harmonogram:

28.9.16 - Začatie kampane  6.11.16 - Ukončenie kampane 15.11.16 Prijatie peňazí + Začatie produkcie 10.12.16 Predpokladané ukončenie výroby a zasielanie zásielok do EU 15.12.16 Zasielanie zásielok mimo krajín EU, ako USA, AUD,.. 
 

Naše finančné ciele pri:

10 000  USD  nakúpenie materiálu ktorý potrebujeme, začatie výroby mikín + 3D PVC nášiviek.

20 000  USD  kúpa vyšívacieho stroja.

50 000  USD Nová edícia pre celé rodiny napr: tričká, šiltovky a nové druhy nášiviek

70 000   USD zakúpenie úplného strojového vybavenia

90 000   USD WAU !!! Zvýšenie produkcie a začatie predaja v školách, obchodoch, eshopoch.

 

ĎAKUJEME

Chcel by som Vám poďakovať za akúkoľvek pomoc a poprosiť Vás o šírenie našej kampane do sveta cez facebook, Instagram, Pinterest a samozrejme po ukončení kampane navštívením nášho vlastného ESHOPU.

Risk a výzva

Crowdfunding projekty už sledujem dlho, toto je naša prvá kampaň takže si dávame záležať. Našou najväčšou úlohou je dodržať rýchlo a poriadne slovo. Zaviazali sme sa k zaslaniu vysoko kvalitného oblečenia, včas a s cieľom nad očakávania. Ako bolo uvedené vyššie, prijali sme všetky potrebné opatrenia, s cieľom zabezpečiť hladký prechod výroby. K niektorým rizikám patrí materiálny nedostatok, nedostatok pracovných síl alebo problémy zásielok. Ale CHATEEE tím tvrdo pracoval, aby sa ubezpečil, že žiadna z týchto potenciálnych hrozieb sa nestane skutočnosťou.

Často kladené otázky:

Moja veľkosť nieje k dispozícií, čo mám robiť ?

Prosím napíšte mi v emaily mi akú potrebujete, a ja Vás informujem , či je možné vyhovieť Vám .

Kde si môžem vybrať akú chcem veľkosť, farbu, nášivky , druhy a počty nášiviek?

Po ukončení kampane Vám zašleme emailom formulár, kde musíte presne uviesť všetky detaily ako veľkosť, farbu, druhy a počet nášiviek. 

Dá sa oblečenie prať ?

Áno , samozrejme doporučujeme na 30 tke

Odliepať a priliepať nášivky na mikiny môžete tisícky ráz – máme to testované !

Zdravotná nezávadnosť ?

Mikiny sú certifikované a zmes, ktorým sa priliepa suchý zips na mikiny je zdravotne nezávadná.

Certifikát posielam na vyžiadanie.

·Čo v prípade, ak mi moja veľkosť nebude dobre sedieť ?

Pokiaľ Vám objednaná mikina nebude sedieť, pošlite ju jednoducho späť a my Vám ju vymeníme za druhú! Medzinárodný zákazníci budú spoplatnený poštovným 10 EUR.

Môžem ti zaslať vlastný motív a vybrať k tomu oblečenie ?

Ano samozrejme, avšak Vašu požiadavku budem môcť vykonať až po ukončení kampane.

Pošlete mi Váš návrh, a ja posúdim či sa to dá technicky zrealizovať a odpíšem Vám.

Ako môžem objednať viac ako len jeden sveter cez Indiegogo?

Radi vyhovieme špeciálnym požiadavkám, ak by ste chceli objednať viac z jedného kusu! Jednoducho napíšte koľko kusov z daného PERKU a odošlite nám rýchlu správu. Sledujeme priaznivcov, ktorí majú špeciálnu požiadavku, a my sa sa tak uistíme, že dostanete položky, ktoré chcete!

Máte ďalšie otázky:

Prosím kontaktujte ma na: info@chateee.com

WHY CHATEEE ? It  enhances  childrens  IQ,  because  they  guessing  words,  they try to  remember different terms  and  names on  sweatshirt,  which  they  have  created.  They create words out of alphabet,  which  they  have  learned,  or  they  can  create  their  own words. They think about various games in patches, creating  poems in text patches, they can  create  different  character  every  day   and  think   about   how  actually create it.They can make new  friendships,  because kids are still so open  minded,  they can write to each other and  exchange  characters in between  them,  but still being part of it.It enriches  creativity,  by coloring  sticky bubbles,  they change shapes,  they play games in other icons, even creating stories.This concept could be also applied in schools and daycares. 
 
It could help to improve communication and relationships between parents and kids. They can draw, play guessing games and leaving each other messages, which makes them think!!!
You will be pleased to know that you dont have to be ONLINE! What that does  mean? Kids are going to feel more relaxed in these sweatshirts, they dont need to be spending time on phone. They play and learn like we used to!
This concept contains aproximately 100 patches. It is flexible, usable for wide scale of audience, different age levels, also knowledge.
It contains different types of the pictures.  Sports, fairytale characters, universe, transport, food – everything what children love!
Because it has been created to be UNISEX, COOL and ORIGINAL.
Because it is modern, multipurpose, partly handmade, memorable and affordable!
 
Did  you  know  that the  patches in fashion are nowadays  very  trendy?  Check  out  some celebs pictures !


 
 FOUNDER STORY:
My name is Ales Raus, I’m 33 years old and I’m from Slovakia. While my studies at University, I decided to go to London for my summer break and improve my English skills. My trip was almost over, when I decided to help my friend to clean windows. When we were almost done, I accidently felt from the ladder. This fall was such disconsolate that it left me paralyzed on half of my body and it damaged my spinal cord as well. In one second my whole life changed; horrible pain and struggle to stand up, all this in foreign country. I was hyperactive since I was a child and I could not imagine myself without walking or running; just sitting for the rest of my life. Dear God, that was such a horrible imagination. It took me a while until I was able to stand again on my feet from the wheelchair and get back to normal life. Strong belief in God along with my faith to get soon better got connected with my faith to accomplish something big in my life and urge to become successful among healthy individuals. It has been couple years after my accident and I had the opportunity to visit me the most admired New York City. The city you can see almost in every movie. This amazing city gave me the idea about interactive clothing. The idea came to me while waiting in metro station for train. I was observing people; everyone was super busy with their phones either texting or calling. Some young boys were sticking stickers on trash cans... I was thinking to myself; what a busy life. Nobody is paying attention to others, they don't even look at each other’s. And suddenly - idea: " Why don't we start to communicate on ourselves? This could be the way we can express ourselves, leave the message, draw attention and be original at the same time. For the most of the time, I was working on this project on my own. With support of this campaign, you will help me to accomplish my dreams.

AFTER  OUR  CAMPAIGN  END,  WE  WILL  SEND  YOU  SURVEY  WHICH   SIZE, COLOR,  PATCHES  AND  NUMBER  OF  PATCHES  YOU  WANT EXACTLY INTO YOUR PERK !

 


 
OUR 3D PLASTIC PVC PATCHES


After our research we picked most favourite characters.  Some of these characters have been created by kids! 
It is entirely up to you, how many characters and which type of patches you are gonna pick to your perks.
 

 

 
ABOUT CHATEEE SWEATSHIRTS
We have developed special glue and technical process for Velcro application.
Sweatshirts are covered with little balls, with Velcro only from front side. Sweatshirts can be washed in washing machines on 30 degrees.
You can stick and unstick velcro 1000´s.
Sweatshirts are made out of cotton and elastan.
Sweatshirts are very comfortable to wear.
Sweatshirts are made out of safe and certified materials.
Sweatshirts are partly handmade.
 

 
 OUR GOALS
 
We want to use the funds raised to help us finance our first production. The minimum order of 3D PVC patches with better price are 1000 pieces, for sweatshirts are 200 pieces and for Velcro thousands of dots. Altogether the material and production costs for the first order amount to roughly 10.000 Euro.
 

 
THANKS 
I would like to say BIG thank you and ask you for a favour at the same time. Please share this campaign over facebook, instagram, pinterest and also please visit our e-shop!
AFTER OUR CAMPAIGN END, WE WILL SEND YOU SURVEY WHICH SIZE, COLOR, PATCHES  AND  NUMBER OF PATCHES YOU WANT EXACTLY INTO YOUR PERK !
 

RISK and CHALLANGES 
We are watching crowdfunding for a long time now and this is ours first campaign, so We make extra effort to get everything right.  Our biggest challenge is getting the word out quickly and eventually expanding the product line to accommodate all of our consumers’ needs. We are committed to delivering high-quality apparel, on time, and with the goal of exceeding expectations. As mentioned above, all of the necessary precautions have been taken to assure a smooth production transition. Some risks include material shortage, labor shortage, or shipment issues. But CHATEEE team has worked hard to make sure none of these potential threats become real.
 

 
 

  
 
 FAQ
My size isn´t available ? 
Contact us via email please and we will deal with your request! 
Where we write what size, color, patches and number of patches need?
After our campaign end, We will send you survey which size, color, patches , and number of patches you want. 
Are sweatshirts washable ? 
We recommend on 30 degrees.
What if my clothes don´t fit right ?
If one of your clothes don't fit quite right, send them back !International customers will be subject to a $15 exchange fee.
Can I send you my own motives ?
Yes, of course you can, but we will be able to deal with your request after finishing the campaign.  Could you please send me your design and I will le´t you know if we can pursue.
How can I order more than one sweatshirt via Indiegogo ?
We are happy to accommodate special requests if you would like to order more of one item! Simply increase your pledge amount to correspond with the amount of items you would like to order and send us a quick message. We’re keeping track of backers who have a special request, and we’ll make sure you receive the items you want!
Have any further questions ?
Please,  email me directly at : info@chateee.com for any other inquiries.
 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
Prečo práve Chateee ? 
zvyšuje deťom IQ – pretože hádajú slová textu, snažia sa zapamätať rôzne názvy a mená na mikinách, ktoré si deti medzi sebou vytvorili . Z abecedy skladajú slová, ktoré sa naučili, alebo vymýšľajú vlastné . Rozmýšľajú nad hrami v ikonkách, vytvárajú rôzne básne v textových ikonkách , každý deň môžu stvárňovať inú obľúbenú postavičku a premyslieť ako ju vytvoria , ..
Nadväzuje  priateľstvá pretože doslova láka deti medzi sebou sa hrať , písať si, vymieňať si postavičky navzájom, kresliť si a hrať spoločné hry na sebe.
Spestruje detskú kreativitu - pretože v bublinkách vykresľujú rôzne postavičky , tvary,  na ďalších nášivkách sa hrajú hry, vytvárajú rôzne príbehy medzi postavičkami, zvieratkami a inými nášivkami
Pretože je koncept využiteľný ako učebná pomôcka pre deti v škôlkach a školách .
Pomáha prehĺbiť rodinné putá - pretože rodičia sa viac so svojimi deťmi hrajú, hádajú čo napíšu, nakreslia, hrajú s nimi hry , zanechávajú si rôzne odkazy a núti ich to premýšľať!
Určite budete nadšení , že nie sme on-line ale OFF-LINE ! Čo to znamená ? Že pri mikinách sa deti uvoľnia, nepotrebujú stále šťukať do mobilu . Hrajú sa tradičným spôsobom, učia a vymýšľajú presne tak ako my keď sme boli mladí !
Pretože koncept je ilustračne obohatený počtom asi 40 obrázkov. Je variabilný, použiteľný pre širokú škálu rôznej úrovne rozvoja mentálnych schopností, vedomostí detí.
Pretože obsahuje kompletnú líniu detských nášiviek oslavujúcich športy, rozprávkové bytosti, vesmír, dopravné prostriedky, jedlo – proste všetko čo deti milujú !
Pretože je vytvorený ako UNISEX, COOOL a je originálny .
Pretože mikiny sú moderné, viacúčelové, imidžové, ručne robené, zapamätateľné a cenovo dostupné.
 
O nás:
Koncept sme najskôr vymysleli pre seba, aby sme skúsili komunikovať aj iným spôsobom, zabávali, odkazovali na sebe myšlienky okoliu.. Avšak časom sme pochopili, že je ti ideálny produkt pre deti ich rodičov a školy .Strávili sme pri tom vyšše 1,5 roka, dali si vyvinúť vlastnú zmes a technologický postup na priliepanie suchého zipsu o mikiny, tak by sa dali prať a na stovky ráz namáhať priliepaním a odliepaním. Oslovili sme čo najväčšiu skupinu detí, rodičov, riaditeľov škôlok, škôl a rôznych študentských organizácií o tom aké farby mikín sa im najviac páčia, aké by chceli mať postavičky na ikonkách a aké druhy ikoniek by radi nosili. Dnes môžeme CHATEEE mikiny kľudne nazvať riešením „Všetko V Jednom“ je to produkt zábavný pretože deti si kreslia rôzne hry , píšu rôzne veci do bubliniek , vymieňajú obľúbené nášivky, hádajú kto má čo vo vrecúšku, vytvárajú priateľstvá, píšu si rôzne básničky do nezmývateľných textových bubliniek atď.   
Grafiky na 3D plastické PVC nášivky
Obrázky nižšie slúžia nato, aby ste si presne vedeli vybrať aké nášivky chcete do svojich balíčkov ! 
Je na vašom výbere, ktoré a koľko postavičiek si vyberiete do svojich balíčkov.
Na základe výskumu medzi deťmi sme vybrali najobľúbenejšie postavičky.
Niektoré z postavičiek nakreslili sami decká ! 
 
O CHATEEE mikinách:
Máme vypracovaný vlastné lepidlo a technologický postup aplikácie suchého zipsu na mikiny.
Mikinky sú pokryté krúžkami zo suchého zipsu iba z prednej strany. Mikiny môžete  prať pri 30 stupňoch.
Môžete na mikiny priliepať a odliepať len nášivky a to tisíce ráz.
Mikiny sú vyrobené s bavlny a elastanu .
Mikiny sú príjemne počesané.
Mikiny sú zdravotne nezávadné
 
Časový harmonogram:
28.9.16 - Začatie kampane  6.11.16 - Ukončenie kampane 15.11.16 Prijatie peňazí + Začatie produkcie 10.12.16 Predpokladané ukončenie výroby a zasielanie zásielok do EU 15.12.16 Zasielanie zásielok mimo krajín EU, ako USA, AUD,..  
Naše finančné ciele pri: 
10 000  USD  nakúpenie materiálu ktorý potrebujeme, začatie výroby mikín + 3D PVC nášiviek.
20 000  USD  kúpa vyšívacieho stroja.
50 000  USD Nová edícia pre celé rodiny napr: tričká, šiltovky a nové druhy nášiviek
70 000   USD zakúpenie úplného strojového vybavenia
90 000   USD WAU !!! Zvýšenie produkcie a začatie predaja v školách, obchodoch, eshopoch.
 
ĎAKUJEME
Chcel by som Vám poďakovať za akúkoľvek pomoc a poprosiť Vás o šírenie našej kampane do sveta cez facebook, Instagram, Pinterest a samozrejme po ukončení kampane navštívením nášho vlastného ESHOPU.
Risk a výzva 
Crowdfunding projekty už sledujem dlho, toto je naša prvá kampaň takže si dávame záležať. Našou najväčšou úlohou je dodržať rýchlo a poriadne slovo. Zaviazali sme sa k zaslaniu vysoko kvalitného oblečenia, včas a s cieľom nad očakávania. Ako bolo uvedené vyššie, prijali sme všetky potrebné opatrenia, s cieľom zabezpečiť hladký prechod výroby. K niektorým rizikám patrí materiálny nedostatok, nedostatok pracovných síl alebo problémy zásielok. Ale CHATEEE tím tvrdo pracoval, aby sa ubezpečil, že žiadna z týchto potenciálnych hrozieb sa nestane skutočnosťou.
Často kladené otázky:
Moja veľkosť nieje k dispozícií, čo mám robiť ?
Prosím napíšte mi v emaily mi akú potrebujete, a ja Vás informujem , či je možné vyhovieť Vám .
Kde si môžem vybrať akú chcem veľkosť, farbu, nášivky , druhy a počty nášiviek? 
Po ukončení kampane Vám zašleme emailom formulár, kde musíte presne uviesť všetky detaily ako veľkosť, farbu, druhy a počet nášiviek. 
Dá sa oblečenie prať ?
Áno , samozrejme doporučujeme na 30 tke
Odliepať a priliepať nášivky na mikiny môžete tisícky ráz – máme to testované !
Zdravotná nezávadnosť ?
Mikiny sú certifikované a zmes, ktorým sa priliepa suchý zips na mikiny je zdravotne nezávadná.
Certifikát posielam na vyžiadanie.
·Čo v prípade, ak mi moja veľkosť nebude dobre sedieť ? 
Pokiaľ Vám objednaná mikina nebude sedieť, pošlite ju jednoducho späť a my Vám ju vymeníme za druhú! Medzinárodný zákazníci budú spoplatnený poštovným 10 EUR.
Môžem ti zaslať vlastný motív a vybrať k tomu oblečenie ?
Ano samozrejme, avšak Vašu požiadavku budem môcť vykonať až po ukončení kampane.
Pošlete mi Váš návrh, a ja posúdim či sa to dá technicky zrealizovať a odpíšem Vám.
Ako môžem objednať viac ako len jeden sveter cez Indiegogo?
Radi vyhovieme špeciálnym požiadavkám, ak by ste chceli objednať viac z jedného kusu! Jednoducho napíšte koľko kusov z daného PERKU a odošlite nám rýchlu správu. Sledujeme priaznivcov, ktorí majú špeciálnu požiadavku, a my sa sa tak uistíme, že dostanete položky, ktoré chcete!
Máte ďalšie otázky: 
Prosím kontaktujte ma na: info@chateee.com

story:
My mission: 

My name is Barbara Post-Askin. I was born in 1931 and grew up in Brooklyn, New York during the Great Depression and World War II. During my childhood years, I treasured the hours I spent listening to survivors of the Civil War on the radio. It helped me to understand the sacrifices made in building this great nation. My journey through these challenging times inspired my thirst for history and validated the power of liberty on which America was built.

A few years ago, I was compelled to write my memoir as a gift to my family. America was once again being challenged, but this time from within. I wanted to ensure the foundation of freedom that our Country was built on, would not be forgotten by future generations. My book, Reflections of Liberty, reminds us of what made this Country great and how each of us must take responsibility for our liberty.

After writing my book, I have been privileged to be able to speak to high schools and universities about my book and history. While speaking to them, it shocked me to find out that many students do not even know who our first president was! History is not an important subject in schools anymore and many schools are completely doing away with it.

This is a horrible mistake. 

History is one of the most important aspects of learning. Without it, the younger generation is doomed to repeat the mistakes a younger America made.

Along with this, I also discuss how, as a result of technology and information overload, children are not given any time to prioritize information and learn about events going on around them. Patriotism is waning, as are the values that our country has held so dear since it's birth. 

Thousands of people in my generation pass away every day, and I believe it is our responsibility not to let the lessons they learned defending our country and American values die with them. Telling my story is one way of preserving the diaries, photographs, artifacts from WWII and the Great Depression. Take the challenge with me and help me get my book into museums, schools & historical societies. So together, we can keep history alive!

My mission is simple: With your contributions, I would like to donate 100 books to museums, schools and historical societies across the country to help keep my story alive, as someone who has lived through America's darkest days. 

Breakdown of the $2500 we hope to raise: 

$2100 for the cost of the books including shipping and handling

$400 for marketing this campaign to reach more people (This includes hiring a marketer to help spread the word and Facebook ads) 


About Reflections Of Liberty: 

"Barbara Post-Askin becomes the voice of a dying generation in her memoir, Reflections of Liberty. From the mass European migration in the early 1900s, to the end of World War II, Post-Askin's stories relay the triumphs, losses, and often forgotten values of a young America. Throughout the stories Post-Askin tells, she highlights the differences between her generation and those of today. The steady decline of family values, the ambivalence towards political issues, the increase in everyday fear and violence, as well as the lack of face-to-face communication are all hazardous changes to the ideals of upcoming Americans. She also discusses the quickly waning sense of patriotism, as well as the lack of freedom amongst our nation's people, and reminds us that these are the founding tenets of this country. To lose them is to lose our identity! By allowing us to experience the life of a woman raised in a time and in conditions so different from today, Reflections of Liberty encourages readers to question our own values and decisions. These stories will inspire readers to reconsider what is truly important, while also calling the young adults of today to action. The new generations are the only ones who will be able to turn the United States back into the ‘Land of the Free.’ If we cannot reclaim our liberty, Post-Askin fears that the darkest days of our nation are doomed to repeat themselves."

Barnes and Noble 5 star review: 

“Mrs. Post-Askin’s book, Reflections of Liberty, is a modern-day history classic. 5 out of 5 stars for the magnificent portrait of American history!”

Find the book on: 
Amazon 
Barnes & Noble
Mira Digital Publishing

What I need & what you get: 

We're looking to raise $2500 total. No matter how little or how much you can give, know that it is all appreciated. 

*Please leave us your email when donating

Donation levels: 

1. **FEATURED PERK**

$50.00 USD free shipping

Get a book-Donate a book

One personally autographed physical copy of the book will be mailed to you and one will be donated to a museum. We will also thank you on the official Facebook page. In addition, you will receive a custom digital badge, to proudly display on your email or social media platforms acknowledging your support to keep American history alive!

2. Online Thank You!

$5.00 USD

Thank you for supporting the mission to keep American history alive! No matter the amount we appreciate your donation and we will send you a thank you email. 

3. Certificate Of Appreciation

$15.00 USD

A Certificate of Appreciation will be emailed to you. We will list your name on the Indiegogo campaign acknowledging your support.

3. Digital Delivery 

$45.00 USD

Digital eBook (Kindle) copy of Reflections of Liberty.

A Certificate of Appreciation will be emailed to you and a heartfelt 'thank you' will be listed on our Facebook page.

Additionally, we will list your name on the Indiegogo campaign acknowledging your support.

4.Your Very Own Copy (Free Shipping & Handling)

$75.00 USD

Personally autographed physical copy of Reflections Of Liberty will be mailed to you.

Letter to museum with “made possible by” *your name here."

Author will thank you personally on her official Facebook page.

Certificate of Appreciation emailed to you.

Additionally, we will list your name on the Indiegogo campaign acknowledging your support.

5. Bronze Sponsorship (Free Shipping & Handling)

$150 USD

Personally autographed physical copy of Reflections Of Liberty will be mailed to you.

Letter to museum with “made possible by” *your name here.*

Digital badge to be used on social media and/or emails. 

Author will thank you personally on her official Facebook page.

Certificate of Appreciation emailed to you.

Additionally, we will list your name on the Indiegogo campaign acknowledging your support.


6. Silver Sponsorship (Free Shipping & Handling)

$300 USD

We will ship your favorite school, charity, museum, etc. 10 personally autographed copies of Reflections Of Liberty.

A one-hour chat (by appointment) with Barbara Post-Askin, the author, via FaceTime or Skype.

Personally autographed physical copy of Reflections of Liberty mailed to you.

Letter to museum with "made possible by" *your name here.*

Certification of appreciation emailed to you.

Additionally, we will list your name on the Indiegogo campaign acknowledging your support.

Digital badge to be used on social media and/or emails.

7. Gold Sponsorship (Free Shipping & Handling)

$500 USD 

We will ship your favorite school, charity, museum, etc. 25 personally autographed copies of Reflections Of Liberty.

A one-hour chat (by appointment) with Barbara Post-Askin, the author, via FaceTime, Skype, or phone.

Personally autographed physical copy of Reflections of Liberty mailed to you.

Letter to museum with "made possible by" *your name here.* 

Certification of appreciation emailed to you.

Additionally, we will list your name on the Indiegogo campaign acknowledging your support.

Digital badge to be used on social media and/or emails. 




Challenges I face: 

History is undervalued. Many people might overlook this campaign because they do not deem it as important. However, I believe in my mission and know that we can make a difference in this world. 

With your support, we can keep history alive! 


Can't donate? Here's how you can still help:

If you can't donate, you can still help spread the word! Tell a friend, or 25! We would love it if you would copy and past our campaign link and share it on Facebook, Twitter or anywhere you see fit. We appreciate your support more than you know! 

Link: https://igg.me/at/reflectionsofliberty

Connect with us on Facebook or Twitter to reach out with your support. 

Also, if you know of a museum that might be interested, please email us at barbarapostaskin@gmail.com with the name!

Challenges I face: 
 History is undervalued. Many people might overlook this campaign because they do not deem it as important. However, I believe in my mission and know that we can make a difference in this world. 
With your support, we can keep history alive! 



    Can't donate? Here's how you can still help: If you can't donate, you can still help spread the word! Tell a friend, or 25! We would love it if you would copy and past our campaign link and share it on Facebook, Twitter or anywhere you see fit. We appreciate your support more than you know!
